context_bundle.summary: Vector is a high-performance, end-to-end observability data pipeline for collecting, transforming, and routing logs, metrics, and traces

onboarding.quick_start: helm install vector vector/vector --namespace vector --set role=Agent && kubectl get pods -n vector
common_patterns: Source configuration: 'vector.toml' with 'file' source for log collection from files
Transform pipeline: 'remap' transforms with '.status = string!(.status)' for data transformation
Health monitoring: 'vector tap sources' and 'vector tap transforms' for real-time debugging
Load balancing: 'elasticsearch' sink with 'batch.max_events = 1000' for throughput optimization
Multiple outputs: 'fork' transform to send data to multiple destinations simultaneously
known_errors: No events received: 'vector sources list' and verify file paths and permissions
High CPU usage: 'vector top' and optimize transform regex complexity and buffer sizes
Connection refused: 'curl http://elasticsearch:9200' and verify sink endpoint configuration
Backpressure: 'vector tap buffers' and increase buffer max_events and timeout values
Configuration validation: 'vector config validate /etc/vector/vector.toml' to check syntax errors
